original_text: Again he measured a thousand, and it was a river that I could not pass through, for the water had risen. It was deep enough to swim in, a river that could not be passed through.
korean_text: 다시 천 척을 측량하시니 물이 내가 건너지 못할 강이 된지라 그 물이 가득하여 헤엄칠 만한 물이요 사람이 능히 건너지 못할 강이더라

sentences.original_text: and it was a river that I could not pass through,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 내가 건널 수 없는 강이었으니,

sentences.original_text: It was deep enough to swim in,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 물은 헤엄쳐 건널 만큼 깊어서,

sentences.original_text: a river that could not be passed through.
